Here are some real numbers of model parameters with respect to different hyper-parameter settings. The training data (determining the **io** parameters) we use here is zh-en bitext from [The Multitarget TED Talks Task](http://www.cs.jhu.edu/~kevinduh/a/multitarget-tedtalks/).

These two tables are generated by `rnn_param_example.ipynb` and `transformer_param_example.ipynb`.
